name: Play Guys
description:
Be the first to the finish line!
Run trough the field and try not to be detected.
The game becomes more challenging and fun with level.

Play Guys features:
◉ Addictive gameplay
◉ Beautiful handmade 3d graphics
◉ Endless fun
◉ Collect coins to unlock new handsome skins
◉ Haptic feedback
◉ Optimization for all screens
